attributes.action: Stop HGVs using the road network during rush hours for a discount in their road fund license
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a HGV's tries to overtake another one by going 1 mph faster they can cause traffic jams for over a mile. Why not give them a discount off their road fund license(tax disc), which is already one of the dearest in europe, for not using the road network during the rush hours. i.e. 7:00-9:00 and 16:30-18:30.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
